data.Name: Lyle Lovett and his Large Band
ARTURO SANDOVAL 10 Time Grammy Award Winner
data.Description: Singer & Simpson Productions Proudly Present ARTURO SANDOVAL 10 Time Grammy Winner! Cuban-American trumpeter Arturo Sandoval, one of the most dynamic and vivacious entertainers of our time, and a protégé of the legendary jazz trumpeter Dizzy Gillespie, is a brilliant, multifaceted and renowned musician. Arturo Sandoval has won 10 Grammy Awards and was awarded The Presidential Medal of Freedom in 2013. He received an Emmy Award for his composing work on the underscore of the HBO movie based on his life, For Love or Country starring Andy Garcia as Arturo. He has performed at The Whitehouse and at the Super Bowl with Tony Bennett and Patti LaBelle. Mr Sandoval has recorded 32 albums as a leader, and 36 more in collaboration with other prominent artists. He is a composer, arranger and conductor with multiple film credits, a ballet score, and performances with symphonies here and in Europe. He is a six time Billboard Award winner and received the 2015 Hispanic Heritage Award.

data.Name: Crystal Gayle
data.Description: Crystal was inducted into the Grand Ole Opry as a member in January 2017 by her sister Loretta Lynn. The Academy of Country Music recognized Crystal with a 2016 Cliffie Stone Pioneer Award for her lifetime achievements in country music. These honors are fitting tributes to Crystal who has been a favorite of audiences of country and popular music since attaining national prominence with her first chart records in the mid-seventies. Renowned for her classic recording of her timeless signature song Don?t It Make My Brown Eyes Blue, Crystal also scored with her multi-format hits You?ve Been Talking In Your Sleep, When I Dream, Half the Way and her duet with Eddie Rabbitt, Just You and I. Crystal has released over twenty number one hits and has been awarded numerous times by the Grammy?s, the Country Music Association, the Academy of Country Music, the American Music Awards, and the American Music Operators Association.

data.Name: Lukas Nelson and Promise of the Real
Evening in Rio with the Best of Brazil
data.Description: Brazilian music is a celebration of rhythm and passion. In the early 1960s, Brazilian Bossa Nova took America by storm when the artistry of Antônio Carlos Jobim, João Gilberto, Luis Bonfa, lyricist Vinícius de Moraes and others was discovered by American jazz musicians like Charlie Byrd and Stan Getz. Born of the Samba, slowing the tempo, adding beautiful melody, sophisticated harmony and finished with poetry, songs like, The Girl from Ipanema, Quiet Nights of Quiet Stars, Wave and many more transported us to the beaches and nightclubs of Rio. Celebrate the music of Brazil with the genius of the finest Brazilian musicians - Romero Lubambo guitar, Nilson Matta bass, Duduka da Fonseca drums/percussion, pianist Helio Alves, vocalist Maucha Adnet and the great American tenor sax Harry Allen honoring Antônio Carlos Jobim, João Gilberto, Stan Getz on a delightful evening in Rio. Presented by Singer & Simpson Productions.

data.Name: Black Jacket Symphony Presents Led Zeppelin's 'IV'
data.Description: Remember putting on an album and listening from start to finish? Relive that moment with a live concert experience unlike any other as The Black Jacket Symphony recreates the iconic album Led Zeppelin IV live in its entirety. Over the past ten years, the Black Jacket Symphony has performed over 40 classic rock albums, bringing an incredible night of entertainment to over a million music lovers across the US. It is a full night of rock and roll magic, plus a visual experience unlike any other. Fans across the country flock to their shows, and once you see one, you will not miss another! It is a full rock-and-roll experience! Black jackets for them, blue jeans for you.

data.Name: Disney's DCappella
data.Description: Disney Concerts presents Deck the Halls with Disney featuring DCappella. Delight in a family night-out set to the magical and musical sounds of Disney?s premier a cappella singing sensation DCappella! Kick off the holiday season as DCappella takes you through a musical journey featuring all of your favorite holiday songs PLUS Disney?s greatest hits from Encanto, The Little Mermaid, The Lion King, Beauty and the Beast, and much more!

data.Name: The Fab Four - The Ultimate Tribute
